## Component class

Abstract Component class. This class is part of the ECS subsystem.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare abstract class Component 
```

## Remarks

Classes that extend the Component class should not managed the data it generates. Data within this classes that extend the Component class should only be managed by the System class, and it's inheritors. Metadata for classes that extend the Component class is handled by both the Entity class and the Scene class.

## Example

Extending the Component class:

```ts
class ComponentName extends Component {
  // ...component data...
}
```
